name: Kevin Robles
text: It was great while it lasted but it appears to be permanently closed now.

name: Ingrid
text: Called for delivery and the person was helpful! Even went a little further to get me the right deal so I didn't have to overpay. Good customer service experience ðŸ¤—

name: Saif Jabbar
text:
Ordered dine in
45 minutes and no food
Finally pizza came in and both were old pizza's and they didn't even bother re-heating it
It was so cold

name: TONY PETERS
text: Really good pizza but I've never seen their salad bar open. It must be me as i usually get pizza late. Staff is friendly and not much of a wait.

name: Michael Simms
text:
It's great when they answer the phone. Am I the only one who has called again and again.
Only to get no response.

name: DirxClvck
text: Took about ten minutes to eat, ordered to go because all the seats are sticky and wooden which is very hard to keep clean.  The pizza was good, gotta try the thin crust N.Y. style.

name: Christina Thompson
text: This particular Pizza Hut in El Cajon was disgusting. I asked for one pizza to be well done with extra sauce. They made all 3 of my pizzas well done and the one that was supposed to have extra sauce was dry. My medium was under cooked it â€¦More

name: Jeff Bush
text: $18.71 for a medium meatlovers that was the size of a small.  It was good but it's the last one I'm buying.  NEVER AGAIN

name: chamorritakisses
text: Long wait even though your the only person in the restaurant. Carry out, or dine in customers most definitely in not their priority.... Don't ask about the specials... Their body language makes it obvious that you have inconvenienced them. Look for specials online, and beforehand.

name: Lee Austin
text: It's a great pizza place reminds me of the one i went to as a child. Its hard to find a sitdown pizzahut anymore. I remember getting a free personal pan pizza as a kid when i completed the reading challenge in elementary school. Too bad they dont have the iconic red hut buildings anymore.

name: Doc D
text: Unfortunately, I have to agree with the individuals who made the claim that the folks over there don't answer the phone. I have called several times at different times of different days. Once, someone picked up the phone and immediately â€¦More

name: Rita Brooks-Czbas
text: Never a bad experience. Good pizza!

name: Liz Odierno
text: How do you expect to receive business if the employees do not answer the phone. Ive called here twice recently, both calls were made on a Tuesday night about 10:15 pm and the phone just rang and rang and rang. Ill be sure to never waste my time calling this location again.

name: walmartpimp2
text: Answer your stupid phone. What you guys don't like making money or something? Are you communist?

name: Martin Quihui
text: Wors service they send me to difernet stroes for delivery and non wher able to take my order

name: Jesse Messenger
text: Sometimes good, sometimes not. Sunday brunch is no longer served at this location

name: Dr. Ahmed
text:
They always mix orders and don't apologize about it, very rude, the employers there have the worst customer service ever.
WON'T comeback again. DON'T order from here becuz you'll be disappointed.

name: Sylvia Harrell
text: Love there pizza and nice employees

name: Jeffrey Hill
text: Zero stars...expand your delivery...pathetic!
